# ENTITY::GET_ENTITY_FORWARD_X

## Summary
Gets the entity's forward X component

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Gets the X-component of the entity's forward vector.
